price: Ico gihe rero, ukwemera kwabo nta co kwari kubamarira kandi bamaze kwugarizwa bakagirwa n’ibihano. Ni ukwo vyamye rero ku bahakanyi b’aho hambere, ko ukwemera kwabo bamaze kwagirwa n’ibihano ata co kwaba kubamariye. Aho rero, ni ho abagarariji batemera ko hariho Imana Imwe Rudende Allah, baheza bagahanwa, bakagoka bagahona.
arabic: فَلَمۡ يَكُ يَنفَعُهُمۡ إِيمَٰنُهُمۡ لَمَّا رَأَوۡاْ بَأۡسَنَاۖ سُنَّتَ ٱللَّهِ ٱلَّتِي قَدۡ خَلَتۡ فِي عِبَادِهِۦۖ وَخَسِرَ هُنَالِكَ ٱلۡكَٰفِرُونَ

meta.transliteration: falam yaku yanfaʿuhum īmānuhum lammā ra-aw basanā sunnata al-lahi allatī qad khalat fī ʿibādihi wakhasira hunālika al-kāfirūna
